entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 5 May 2023
